title: I was banned for.... this?
body:
I have made a VERY DELIBERATE attempt at being overly polite, but not a doormat, in game. These three game chat logs landed me a ban. You can infer what i had to deal with from the logs themselves. If my "bannable content" is a 1 out of 10, those with me in game were easily at an 8 or 9 out of 10.

How do I appeal? I didn't even curse. There has to be some method of disputing the auto-system of banning people. replies.body:
@Hotarµ

but what if they ARE trolls? What if they specifically set out to ruin the game? I'm to just sit back and smile like a lobotomy patient?

Make sure you press the "Reply" button when responding to someone so they see the notification.

 If someone is trolling, just mute them and report them at the end of the game. You don't have to smile and cheer them on, you just have to not flame them.

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1Eg5VEcu,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-10-03T02:33:55.374+0000)
>
> Make sure you press the "Reply" button when responding to someone so they see the notification.
> 
>  If someone is trolling, just mute them and report them at the end of the game. You don't have to smile and cheer them on, you just have to not flame them.

thank you for the tip on replies.

Reports do NOTHING. I submitted 30+ legit reports over a few days of horrible gaming and got zero feedback.

Those feedback reports are inconsistent, you are never guaranteed to receive them. 

You could report 9 players in one match who all received permanent bans and you _still_ might not get it. That's just how the system works, there is no way to verify if a player has been punished or not.

The Mighty Jingles did a video on this, I'm not sure if I'm allowed to post it, as there is language.  Of course, it was on World of Warships, but it carries over into all MMO's.  The PERCEPTION, due to data protection laws, is that nothing gets done.  In all actuality, something MAY be done, but because no one hears about it directly, and no one sees it directly, the PERCEPTION is nothing happens.  I would, however, point to this forum specifically and say that PLENTY happens.  Whether or not that is a good happening depends on which side of the keyboard you're on.  Indeed, there is a large controversy over the interwebz at this time as to whether or not auto-management is a good thing and to what extent.  Would a mod care to weigh in on whether or not that video is worth posting?  Thanks.

If you received a permanent ban for these games, that means you had 3 prior punishments in the form of a 10 game chat restriction, a 25 game chat restriction, and a 14-day suspension. On your previous reform card it was stated that "**Any** continued negativity will result in a permanent suspension." 

 This includes things like arguing with your team all game (even if you may not be swearing at them), calling people trolls, and asking for reports.

As the warning after the 14 day ban states, any further infraction causes a permanent ban. All you did was flame all game, and if you learned nothing plus ignored the warning, there is not any other option.

Gunna leave this here, many don't know this, but telling people in all chat, or even team chat to report someone, can also result in your account getting reviewed. It's a form of harassment/verbal abuse bullying to gang up on someone, regardless if they're being a toxic person. Needing to constantly tell people you're muting them does nothing, you literally feed the troll by saying that alone, and is also flaming. You don't NEED to type anything at all. You don't NEED to type what you're doing. Specially when you're constantly just complaining to your team / enemy team or about your team, it just comes off as flaming.

This is why I play with /mute all now.

Because I'm already down that path of pure "toxicity".
I don't care if I lose or win games at this point. I just do /mute all and play.

Because, in the end. The trolls win. You don't. Best to shut up and nut up.

Just /mute all and play the game.

Sorry, i should clarify.

I received a chat restriction. I am not banned in any sense of the word. This earned me a chat restriction.
